title: HT Operator (with PWD Electrical License)
tagsAndSkills: HT,Substation,Acb,HT Motors,DG,HT Panels,DG Sets,VCB
jobDescription:
Roles and Responsibilities


Do not connect if you are not holding License

  • Operate HT panels, including switchgear and transformers.
  • Perform routine maintenance tasks on LT panels, DG sets, ACBs, VCBs, and other electrical equipment.
  • Ensure proper functioning of substations (11kv & 33kv) by monitoring voltage levels and making necessary adjustments.
  • Troubleshoot issues with HT motors and perform repairs as needed.
  • Collaborate with team members to resolve complex electrical problems.

Interested candidates can connect at ankit.pandey@sodexo.com

title: Health Operations Senior Analyst
tagsAndSkills: operational support,healthcare operations,claims,client relationship,digital transformation,project management,operations management,hospital management
jobDescription:
Skill required: Operations Support - Pharmacy Benefits Management (PBM)

Designation: Health Operations Senior Analyst

Qualifications:Any Graduation

Years of Experience:5 to 8 years
Language - Ability:English - Intermediate

What would you do?
Embedding digital transformation in healthcare operations end-to-end, driving superior outcomes and value realization today, and enabling streamlined operations to serve the emerging health care market of tomorrowYou will be a part of the Healthcare Claims team which is responsible for the administration of health claims. This team is involved in core claim processing such as registering claims, editing & verification, claims evaluation, and examination & litigation.In Pharmacy Benefits Management, you will be responsible for the business processes, operations and interactions of third party administrators of prescription drug programs, understanding of the processes used to manage programs for payers, process and pay prescription drug claims, develop and maintain the formulary, contract with pharmacies and negotiate discounts and rebates with drug manufacturers.

What are we looking for?
  • Microsoft Excel
  • Ability to perform under pressure
  • Adaptable and flexible
  • Ability to establish strong client relationship
  • Written and verbal communication
  • Prioritization of workload
  • Microsoft Excel
  • Pharmacy Benefits Management (PBM) Roles and Responsibilities:
  • In this role you are required to do analysis and solving of increasingly complex problems
  • Your day to day interactions are with peers within Accenture
  • You are likely to have some interaction with clients and/or Accenture management
  • You will be given minimal instruction on daily work/tasks and a moderate level of instruction on new assignments
  • Decisions that are made by you impact your own work and may impact the work of others
  • In this role you would be an individual contributor and/or oversee a small work effort and/or team
  • Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shiftsQualificationsAny Graduation

title: Lead - Partnerships and Communication
tagsAndSkills: Corporate Social Responsibility,CSR,Communication skills,Partnerships,Leadership,Social Responsibility,Corporate
jobDescription:
Job Responsibilities -


Partnership Management: To manage the process of empanelment and selection of partners -

• Handle requests for CSR Partnerships to identify key implementation partners, source and structure partnerships aligned with the focus areas. • Proactively identify high priority topics and areas to shape future partnerships. • Develop relationships with nonprofit partners, implementing agencies, the social ecosystem and align with CSR strategy of the Bank. • Explore opportunities to create strategic partnership with likeminded entities/Govt and CSR bodies.


Project Management: To monitor the programs being executed directly by the bank -

• Design projects aligned with CSR goals and approved themes • Guide Partnership Manager in evaluating CSR requests from internal and external teams. • Review Requests, evaluate budgets, process approvals, track payments. • Review requests for projects to be taken up for approvals. • To provide support and monitoring for program execution aligned to CSR process. • Guide regional partnership managers in monitoring the project. • Mitigate any project concerns through and incorporate in the project design. • Resolve queries of team and lead the members in seamless execution of projects.


Employee Engagement and Volunteering: To create and drive an overall plan for employee volunteering -

• Create an Annual Volunteering plan. • Identify and curate opportunities for employee volunteering and engagement. • Plan events, track level of engagement and visibility for Parivartan • Execute the calendar with the help of regional partnership managers.


Communication/ Awards/Special Projects: Create a plan for overall CSR communication across Internal and external stakeholders -

• Create an Annual Communication Plan for Parivartan • Drive the communication calendar, newsletters, state reports, presentations and mailers. • Being the point of contact for information and planning of press events, launches, media interactions. • Liaise with Banks Corporate Communications Dept in updating the Parivartan website, social media pages with quality information and strategic inputs • Maintaining the database of documents, pictures, case studies and testimonials. • Create write ups for Award Application submissions. • Drive special initiatives such as Parivartan Excellence Awards social awareness/employee awareness campaigns

title: Urgent Opening Field Sales Executive-Mumbai & Navi-Mumbai (Onrolls)-
tagsAndSkills: field sales,Fire Alarm System,Industrial Sales,Hardware Networking,field executive,OEM Sales,Hardware Sales,Sales engineer
jobDescription:
Dear Candidate,


Greetings of The Day...!!!


We have an URGENT opening for the position of Field Sales Executive" at One of our reputed clients @ their Mumbai & Navi - Mumbai - Location.


Hiring Company Name - Confidential

Job Location: - Mumbai (3) -& Navi - Mumbai (1)

No. of Positions - 4

Designation: Field Sales Executive

Department - CCTV, Hardware Peripherals, Networking Server, Cloud Solutions.

Rolls: - On-Rolls.
Educational Qualification: - Bachelor's Degree in Business or Related Field (Preferably from an Engineering Background)

Salary: - Maximum 20k net in hand & based on complete interview evaluation process too.
Experience - Minimum 1-2 years of experience relevant Industry i.e. in Sales Domain.

Job Nature: - Full Time / Ready to explore field within allotted area.


Purpose of Position

We are seeking a highly motivated Sales Executive to join our team and take responsibility for identifying and establishing relationships with new clients. The successful candidate will be responsible for prospecting, scheduling meetings, and educating clients on our products and services. This individual will play a critical role in driving business growth, and will have the opportunity to work in a dynamic, fast-paced environment.


Key Responsibilities

  • Identifying and establishing relationships with potential clients through door-to-door marketing, networking, cold-calling and other prospecting methods
  • Meeting with prospective clients to understand their needs and educate them on our products and services
  • Communicating with clients to establish their specific needs and tailoring our products and services to meet those needs
  • Maintaining accurate records of all interactions with prospective and existing clients
  • Meeting and exceeding sales targets on a regular basis
  • Act as a liaison between the company and the client, to ensure client satisfaction

TECHNICAL /FUNCTIONAL SKILLS:

  • Bachelor's degree in business or related field
  • Proven track record of successful sales experience / Fresher
  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills
  • Ability to work well under pressure and meet targets
  • Ability to multitask and prioritize effectively
  • Positive attitude and strong work ethic
  • Bachelor's degree in business or a related field is preferred
  • Knowledge of the industry or industry trends would be added advantage


THE PERSON SHOULD BE WILLING TO JOIN IN 10-15 DAYS TIME OR IMMEDIATE JOINER.



Request for interested candidates; Please share your updated resume with us below Email-ID
executivehr@monalisammllp.com


Also candidate can call or WhatsApp us at 9029895581
